entry.content:
🔍 About Nadiology™

Nadiology™ is not just a method. It is a transmission.

Two decades ago in Russia, I was introduced to a system called СПК (S.P.K.) — "The System Transmitted by the Cosmos." It came to a master astrologer in a dream, and she devoted her life to decoding and refining what was given. I was one of the few students entrusted with this teaching.

Since then, I have practiced and deepened this wisdom for over 20 years, integrating my studies in:

  • Astrology (Western and Chinese)
  • Numerology & Digital Psychology
  • Energetics, soul contracts, and timing

Nadiology™ is the synthesis of it all — my life’s work and my soul’s remembrance. It is a living, intelligent system of personal design and cosmic navigation.

This is astrology beyond personality. Beyond prediction. It is your soul’s map, made visible.
